snippet.title: 徐梦圆/嘿人李逵Noisemakers - 《小雨天气》｜Official MV
snippet.description:
月亮眨眨眼睛我把你放在手心
那几个字说出去又怕你假装听不清
叮叮咚咚怎么今晚突然好安静
就等着你 
呼吸决定

Spotify : http://open.spotify.com/album/2MhdwP1ClmivaPdykRSKag
itunes ：https://geo.itunes.apple.com/at/album/id1585107030?at=1l3v9Tx&app=itunes
QQ音乐：http://t.cn/A6Mh5mlc
酷狗音乐：http://t.cn/A6Mh5ml5
酷我音乐：http://t.cn/A6Mh5mlV http://t.cn/A6Mh5m1U ​​​
Netease网易云：https://y.music.163.com/m/song?id=1876438007&uct=aW9oSxF2g2/3nCyjhppVZw%3D%3D&app_version=8.5.41

作曲：李OK/徐梦圆/嘿人李逵Noisemakers
作词：李OK
编曲：SOULFRESHBEATS
演唱：徐梦圆/嘿人李逵Noisemakers
MV：UNKNOWN

月亮眨眨眼睛我把你放在手心
The moon blinks, I put you in my hand
那几个字说出去又怕你假装听不清
I'm afraid you pretend not to hear those words
叮叮咚咚怎么
Ding ding dong dong dong how?
今晚突然好安静
Suddenly so quiet tonight
就等着你 
Just waiting for you
呼吸决定
Breath decision
 
飘飘洒洒的小雨轻轻落在屋顶
The light rain falls gently on the roof
夏夜蝉鸣的节奏竟然也如此熟悉
The rhythm of the cicadas in summer is so familiar
滴滴答答怎么今晚我又梦见你
Tick ​​tick to answer why I dream of you again tonight
很想见你 
Want to see you
不止梦里
Not only in dreams

 怎么还没收到你的消息
Why haven't heard from you yet
但是我也不敢拨过去
But I dare not call it
问你在哪里 
Ask where are you
和谁在一起
Who are you with
怎样的心情 
What kind of mood
是什么天气
What's the weather
该怎么开始话题
How to start the topic
我好怕意外出局
I'm so afraid of being out by accident
得不到你的注意
Can't get your attention
 故事不能继续
The story cannot continue
脑海里都是 
All in my mind
你的笑容你的声音
Your smile, your voice
久久的挥之不去Yeah
Long lingering Yeah
 
月亮眨眨眼睛我把你放在手心
The moon blinks, I put you in my hand
那几个字说出去又怕你假装听不清
I'm afraid you pretend not to hear those words
叮叮咚咚怎么
Ding ding dong dong dong how?
今晚突然好安静
Suddenly so quiet tonight
就等着你 
Just waiting for you
呼吸决定
Breath decision
 
周六的晚上我会送给你花
I will give you flowers on Saturday night
等到电影散场
Wait till the movie ends
骑单车送你回家
Ride a bike to take you home
在小路的巷口
At the alley of the road
用力的跟你挥手
Wave to you vigorously
一直在回味 直到黑夜的尽头
I've been aftertaste till the end of the night
虽然这次还是没有勇气牵你的手
Although I still don't have the courage to hold your hand this time
手心一直紧握 怕被你一眼看破
I've been holding my palm tightly, I'm afraid you will see through it
少年的心事在夏夜 小心翼翼的存放
The youngster’s thoughts are carefully stored in the summer nigh
但有一天想要为你把星空点亮
But one day I want to light up the starry sky for you

飘飘洒洒的小雨轻轻落在屋顶
The light rain falls gently on the roof
夏夜蝉鸣的节奏竟然也如此熟悉
The rhythm of the cicadas in summer is so familiar
滴滴答答怎么今晚我又梦见你
Tick ​​tick to answer why I dream of you again tonight
很想见你 
Want to see you
不止梦里
Not only in dreams

月亮眨眨眼睛我把你放在手心
The moon blinks, I put you in my hand
那几个字说出去又怕你假装听不清
I'm afraid you pretend not to hear those words
叮叮咚咚怎么
Ding ding dong dong dong how?
今晚突然好安静
Suddenly so quiet tonight
就等着你
